abstract: A comparative, prospective, match-cohort  study of 424 pregnancies with and 80 without uterine fibroids reveals elevated platelet-activating factor (PAF), vWF, and thromboxane A2 (TXA2) in 16-28 weeks of gestation at the presence of asymptomatic fibroids.
title: Matevosyan NR, Grigoryan DZ. The clotting battery in pregnancy with uterine fibroids.
subject: law
